Name: 1. Two Sum

Solution: First of all sort all strings by number of elements and add symbols to new string if every string contains it on this position

Name: 20. Valid Parentheses
Solution: Add parenthesis to stack if it opens and remove if last element fits exit par. If stack is empty output is true

Name: 21. Merge Two Sorted Lists
Solution: Choose between best value and add it to new linked list then move pointer of one of the lowest value list to next
